commands.name: debugBuildPart
commands.label: Debug Build Repository Parts text file

commands.name: mbbin
commands.label: bb -t in
commands.cmd: if not [%OP_MERGETOSTREAM%] == [] (bb -t %OP_MERGETOSTREAM% in) else (echo MergeToStream is not defined for stream %TeamName%)

commands.name: mbbout
commands.label: bb -t out
commands.cmd: if not [%OP_MERGETOSTREAM%] == [] (bb -t %OP_MERGETOSTREAM% out) else (echo MergeToStream is not defined for stream %TeamName%)

commands.name: merge
commands.label: push --xstream
commands.cmd: if not [%OP_MERGETOSTREAM%] == [] (bb -t %OP_MERGETOSTREAM% push -u --xstream) else (echo MergeToStream is not defined for stream %TeamName%)
